channel.title: How do i get onto the cfg and class files?
channel.description:
i need a bit of help gettiing onto the cfg files and the class files... here what it comes up with when i click open on the class files:
windows cannot open this file:
file: itemhandler.class
to open this file, windows needs to know what program created it. windows can go online to look it up automatically, or you can manually select from a list of programs on your computer.
what do you want to do?
use the web service to find the appropriate program
select the program from a list
and for the cfg files:
invalid or corrupt jarfile c:\document and settings\(personal info)\my documents\moparscape\moparscape\hybridscape\dialogues.cfg
plz help! :confused:

item.title: How do i get onto the cfg and class files?
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

ok mate heres how u do it !! right click it and click open with , then scroll down and find notepad then make sure the box at the bottom is ticked

Read full topic
